rules_text:
When Jaux's Laborant enters or attacks, mill three cards, then choose a creature card from among them. That card gains conceptualize until end of turn. It's conceptualize cost is equal to its mana cost.
Conceptualize {1}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its conceptualize cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)[/i]
